page.title: 01Introduction
page.content: Our block is primarily in a rural area,which as the land cover illustrates,is grassland and grasing.It is basically a farming community. Most of the amenities are situated in the urban areas. even though we live in a rural area,we have a remarkable amount of inudustry situated on or near the main Dungannon-Coalisland Road.Within two km are some highly successful industries,which have devoloped over the last tweny years. Our industries include :Powerscreen,Powercrusher,Tyrone Crystal,Tyrone Brick and the Co-op.The industries provide employment as do the local Hospitals,Schools,Abattoir and shops.Many of our fathers are contractors and employ local people which increases employment in our block.This is a thriving community.
